Symplicity | Frontend/UI Developer | Washington, DC (Arlington, VA) | ONSITE, VISA, https://symplicity.com

Symplicity has helped guide more than 26 million students to their dream career. We build the worldâ€™s leading campus recruiting software deployed at over 1,100 colleges and also tools to help recruiters land entry-level talent at these universities.

Learn more at https://www.symplicity.com/about/join-us Interested? Email design-careers@symplicity.com
